Member Function Documentation

void VectorDisplay::setCallback ( void(*)(vector2d, vector2d, double, int)  _ptrCallback  )  [inline]

Set callback function to call when the display is clicked

Parameters:
_ptrCallback Function pointer of signature void (*)(vector2d,double,int). The first parameter of the callback is the click location (in world space), the second the orientation (in radians), the third the click type
